abort.no_mower_connected: No mowers connected to this account.

work_area_not_existing.message: The selected work area does not exist.

work_areas_not_supported.message: This mower does not support work areas.

deprecated_entity.description:
The Husqvarna Automower entity `{entity}` is deprecated and will be removed in a future release.
You can use the new returning state of the lawn mower entity instead.
Please update your automations and scripts to replace the sensor entity with the newly added lawn mower entity.
When you are done migrating you can disable `{entity}`.
deprecated_entity.title: The Husqvarna Automower {entity_name} sensor is deprecated

override_schedule_work_area.description: Lets the mower mow for a given duration in a specified work area, overriding all schedules.

work_area_id.description: In which work area the mower should mow.
work_area_id.name: Work area ID

override_schedule_work_area.name: Override schedule work area
